name: Botanical Water Cream
description: A lightweight, silicone free hydrator which primes, smoothes and protects with blue lotus, blue daisy, HA and malachite.

name: Glossier You
description: Glossier You is a soft, warm and familiar skin-scent enhancing fragrance. Sparkling Pink Pepper opens into earthy Iris, settling into a strong, slightly-sweet base of Ambrette and Ambrox that wears close to skin–so it smells a

name: Cloud Paint
description: A seamless cheek colors in both blush and bronzer shades inspired by golden hour sunsets, so natural it’s like your skin made it. Easy to wear and apply, each shade is sheer enough to blend and layer without going overboard.

name: The Beauty Bag
description: This bag is the ultimate home for your beauty routine. It’s tall enough to fit all of your essentials (even full-size skincare!), but still easily slips into your tote. The coated cotton material means you won’t have to worry about spills or splashes, with a removable snap-button interior pouch, and plenty of extra pockets to keep you organized—so you’re never stuck digging for your favorite products.

name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% 60ml
description: The serum is High-Strength Vitamin and Mineral Blemish Formula, formulated with 10% highly concentrated nicotinic acid extract (vitamin B3), supplemented with 1% zinc (zinc salt of pyrrolidone carboxylic acid) to effectively reduce the look of blemishes and balance visible sebum activity, anti-oxidation, anti-inflammatory and oil control. Restore smooth and refreshing skin!

name: ESTEE LAUDER Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex 50ml
description: This night serum is made under the brand’s exclusive ChronoluxTM Power Signal Technology, to maximize collagens and skin cells' nighttime renewal. It can significantly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, improve the skin tone and moisturize skin. What you can get is the supple, radiant and youthful skin after a night of sleep!

name: THE ORDINARY AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution 30ml
description: Formulated with AHA 30% and BHA 2%, it can reduce the appearance of pimples, blackheads, acne marks and black blemishes. Brighten your skin from the inside to the outside, leaving a delicate and tender skin!

name: Libre Eau De Parfum Spray 90ml/3oz
description: An oriental fougere fragrance for modern women. Crisp, spicy, sweet, vibrant, sophisticated & energizing.Top notes are mandarin orange, lavender, blackcurrant & petitgrain

name: Toy Boy Eau De Parfum Spray 50ml/1.7oz
description: A woody spicy fragrance for young men. Fresh, spicy, sweet, vibrant, powdery & bewitching. Top notes of Italian bergamot, green pear, elemi, pink pepper & Indonesian nutmeg

name: HADA LABO Super Hyaluronic Lotion Light 170ml
description: It is infused with three types of hyaluronic acid to penetrate deeply to moisturize and soften skin, meanwhile enhancing the water binding ability of skin, leaving your skin smooth, soft, supple and firm. One drop locks up an ocean. Once you apply, skin becomes supple, nourished and elastic. Weak acidic. Low irritation. Free from fragrance, additive, oil or alcohol.
